issues.description: The return type of messageOnMilk is boolean in the solutionâ€™s Milkable interface and implementations, but the problem statement and UML specify messageOnMilk(): String. This mismatch will confuse students and prevent them from returning the required milk message string.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the Milkable interface so messageOnMilk() returns a String and update all implementations (Seal and Goat) to return the milk message (e.g. "Seal Clarabelle is milked") instead of printing and returning boolean.
